metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29583 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** service_windows.go in the kardianos service package for Go omits quoting that is sometimes needed for execution of a Windows service executable from the intended directory. NOTE: this finding could not be reproduced by its original reporter or by others.

notes.Note: alexmurray> google-guest-agent contains a vendored copy of golang-github-kardianos-service mdeslaur> this issue has been disputed, so marking as not-affected Ubuntu

criterions.comment: google-guest-agent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
